interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Mane Tame Deluxe Pomade 3.3oz/97mL - Firm Hold, Medium Shine - Made in USA, Water-Based, Combable, Rinses Out Easily, BARBER RECOMMENDED - Best used on dry hair Review Date: 2020/12/15 Store: Mane Tame Professional Men's Grooming Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Dry', 'Liquid Volume': '118 Milliliters', 'Item Form': 'Clay', 'Brand': "Mane Tame Professional Men's Grooming", 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3 x 3 x 2.5 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '851088008163'} Review Text: I ordered this because I’m tired of using big-box store hair gel.

I miss using pomade style products and for the few dollars I used to save, 2020 has taught me to treat myself to the small luxuries in life.

Overall, you get A LOT of product in this jar.
I like the texture and the hold.

I spike up my hair a little and this worked well for that.

My problem, and mind you it’s MY problem not the product; is I personally don’t like the smell. It’s like a hairdresser perfume like scent. Very much like it’s got some cologne mixed into it.

You can smell the cologne through the shipping bag.

Overall while I don’t like the scent I absolutely appreciate the quantity provided. The value is definitely there. Review Title: I don’t like the scent but it works well Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
